text: Raúl Méndez Martínez (born April 11, 1975) is a Mexican actor. He was born in Laguna, Torreón, Coahuila, Mexico. He is known for his roles in El Sexo Débil, El Señor de los Cielos and as Colombian President César Gaviria in the Netflix series Narcos. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors
title: Raúl Méndez
